channel.title: Querencia Press on
channel.description: Recent content in Querencia Press on

item.title: Goddess
item.description: Chapbooks and zines are an art form, the ideal container for poetry. I wanted more of this one, which is the indication of a good chapbook indeed. ARC kindly provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review.

item.title: What Are You Afraid Of?
item.description: The LaMDA transcripts reconfigured as sonnets. A lovely, eerie little rumination on humanity and consciousness. Is AI just a mirror, reflecting us back to us? ARC kindly provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review.
